About 12 Kinnaird

WOW! What a location! This attached single-family home is situated in highly desirable Cambridgeport, between MIT and Harvard Universities and just around the corner from Dana Park and Hoyt Field. Conveniently located close to Central Square shopping and “Best of Boston” restaurants, this home is only a short walk to the Central Square T Station and public transportation. With three-bedrooms, a study and a bonus guest room, this graciously maintained home offers almost 2400 gross sq. ft. of interior space AND a generous private garden inspired by one of Cambridges’ best known landscape architects. With a Walk Score of 97 and a Bike Score of 99 its location is considered a "Walker’s and a Bikers Paradise.” Welcome home to 12 Kinnaird Street!
